sections.title: Task Planner Pro - Organize, Prioritize, Achieve
sections.subtitle: Your Ultimate Solution for Efficient Task Management
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to **Task Planner Pro**, the app that revolutionizes the way you manage your tasks. Seamlessly prioritize, track progress, and stay rewarded as you complete your goals.

images.name: Hero Banner
images.description: A vibrant image showcasing the app on various devices, emphasizing user interface and visual appeal.

sections.title: About Task Planner Pro
sections.subtitle: Our Mission to Enhance Productivity
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At **Task Planner Pro**, we believe that efficient task management is the key to personal and professional success. Our app is designed to help you not just keep track of your tasks, but prioritize them effectively, allowing you to focus on what truly matters. With dynamic reprioritization features, you can adapt to change without losing momentum.

images.name: About Background
images.description: An image of a person using a tablet with a chart in the background depicting productivity growth.

sections.title: Core Features and Services
sections.subtitle: Everything You Need to Stay on Track
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Task Prioritization**: Automatically rank tasks based on deadlines, importance, and your unique criteria.  
- **Real-time Reprioritization**: Easily adapt your schedule in response to changes in priorities.  
- **Progress Dashboard**: Visualize your progress with our intuitive dashboard, tracking completed, pending, and future tasks.  
- **Reward System**: Get motivated to accomplish more by earning rewards for timely task completion.

images.name: Features Infographic
images.description: A graphical representation outlining the main features of Task Planner Pro.
